short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No screenshots for slide anymore. Present your website directly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Presenter is a convenient tool for presenting your website directly. You can make your audience focus on whatever you are presenting. 

A quick element selector:
It's helpful when you want to select an element in order to create a slide.

Keyboard shortcuts support:
- "Ctrl + >" show next slide 
- "Ctrl + <" show previous slide
